name: Akemi
description: DESIGNER: Nicolò Zavagno & Irregolare MATERIALS: steel, metal fabric AISI 304 LIGHT SOURCE: max 105W E27 DESCRIPTION Collection born by the young designer’s experience, regular form and metallic fabric take back to oriental experiences, alchemy echoes in the form. akemi the new bright beauty. DOWNLOADS PDF 2D 3D

name: Clips
description: DESIGNER: Mauro Ferrandi & Irregolare MATERIALS: steel LIGHT SOURCE: clips 30 (1x PL-EL/T E27), clips 50 (2x PL-EL/T E27), clips 90 (2x 39W T5 G5) DESCRIPTION Collection characterized by a linear and winning design born by a simple intuition, where the daily use of a working tool as a metallic clip, has given form and name to the collection. the light emitted by the two openings, protected by the metacrilato opalino screen moves, thanks to a technical study, through the metallic curves creating a blade of light that valorizes the body. DOWNLOADS PDF 2D 3D

name: Hego Wall
description: DESIGNER: Mauro Ferrandi & Irregolare MATERIALS: steel, glass LIGHT SOURCE: max 105W E27 DESCRIPTION Collection of lamps influenced by the designers origin, where the beauty of places melts with the art of the wise glassworkers, creating forms and reflections, turning glass into the real protagonist. hego becomes light at the center of life. DOWNLOADS PDF 2D 3D

name: Hoed
description: DESIGNER: Enrico Zanolla & Irregolare MATERIALS: porcelain, fabric cord LIGHT SOURCE: max 46W E27 DESCRIPTION The Hoed supension lamp is handmade starting with a sheet of raw porcelain, flat and then wrapped around a mould for creating its particular shape. Shape and name come from the dutch noun used to identify a hat, and for Hoed the characteristic hat used by dutch women. The delicate light passing through the translucent porcelain skin makes this lamp unique, also because every piece is different in thickness due to the handmade process creating unexpected light shades on every lamp. Hoed is available in white, black finish or in the natural biscuit appearance processed with a layer of protective lacquering. DOWNLOADS PDF 2D

name: Hypnose Suspension
description: DESIGNER: Mauro Ferrandi & Irregolare MATERIALS: glass LIGHT SOURCE: max 1x33W G9 Hal, max 3x33W G9 Hal, max 5x33W G9 Hal DESCRIPTION Collection of suspended lamps where the sphere, in its simpler and pure form, can be repeated creating multiple points of light. the complete vision conquers the environment and hypnotizes the eyes. DOWNLOADS PDF 2D 3D

name: Mienai Suspension
description: DESIGNER: Enrico Zanolla & Irregolare MATERIALS: steel, lacquered MDF LIGHT SOURCE: LED DESCRIPTION Mienai means hidden in japanese, a tribute to the country where this lamp was imagined and then designed during a trip of Enrico Zanolla to Japan. The delicate contrast of steel and wood, matching perfectly and revealing the light as a gift, while the source remains hidden, leaving just the light to speak. The luminous flux is soft and wide thanks to the curves of the upper body that works as a slide. Finally the light source is LED: the choice of high efficiency LED brings maintenance services down thanks to a lifetime 5 times higher than usual bulbs, making Mienai a lamp designed to fit in any interior but enriched with green accent. DOWNLOADS PDF 2D 3D

name: Narcisa
description: DESIGNER: Enrico Zanolla & Irregolare MATERIALS: steel, fabric LIGHT SOURCE: max 105W E27 DESCRIPTION Narcisa is a table and floor lamp, with structure in steel tubes and fabric lampshade. DOWNLOADS PDF 2D 3D

name: Vidon
description: DESIGNER: Enrico Zanolla & Irregolare MATERIALS: ceramic, fabric cord LIGHT SOURCE: max 46W E27 DESCRIPTION Vidon means ‘big screw’ in Friuli language, and its shape is inspired by the press machines screw used in the grapes press process. Crafted from ceramic, it combines the splendid elegance of such refined material to the freshness of textile cord, matching them with the same colour. It's designed to be used with any E27 bulb, but it works ideally with an E27 incandescent or halogen globe. The beauty of simplicity contained in a small piece of art. DOWNLOADS PDF 2D 3D
